title: VERBATIM: More Russian cyber attacks on U.S. elections 'likely'
text:
VERBATIM: More Russian cyber attacks on U.S. elections 'likely' 4:40pm GMT - 01:01 
U.S. Director of National Intelligence Dan Coats said that Russia, as well as other foreign entities, were ''likely'' to pursue more cyber attacks on U.S. and European elections. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. Director of National Intelligence Dan Coats said that Russia, as well as other foreign entities, were "likely" to pursue more cyber attacks on U.S. and European elections. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2srwLNY
